title: One Pot Pizza Pasta
directions: In a medium skillet over medium-high heat, brown the sausage with the onion, garlic. Stir in the uncooked noodles, pepperoni, pizza sauce and water. Cover and cook stirring frequently for 10-15 mins until pasta is ready. Done and delicious!
ingredients: 1 pound sausage or lean ground beef (I use sausage)
1 cup sliced pepperoni sausage ( 6 ounce bag)
2 – 15 ounce canned pizza sauce (I used Chef Boyardee Pizza Sauce With Cheese)
